snippet.title: OUTSIDE PARTIES Playdate Horror Scavenger Hunt: Launch Card and Early UI Test
snippet.description:
Recorded from Playdate hardware using Mirror. Early work-in-progress showing the launch card sequence, some rough placeholder menus, and the imaging system performance. No audio yet.

OUTSIDE PARTIES is my “hidden picture”/“hidden object”-style horror scavenger hunt game, coming to Panic's Playdate handheld game console in 2023. (Much work remains—the artwork is full-res but it’s just rough test art. All details are subject to change!)

Devlog with details and screenshots:
https://devforum.play.date/t/outside-parties-horror-scavenger-hunt-across-a-1-5-gigapixel-hdr-image/9961#top 

Follow me on itch.io:
https://adamsimmersive.itch.io

Follow me on Mastodon:
https://peoplemaking.games/@adamsimmersive
